original_title: Steve Martin and the Steep Canyon Rangers featuring Edie Brickell Live
overview: Steve Martin and The Steep Canyon Rangers, featuring Edie Brickell, in their first-ever live concert performance to be broadcast on television. Check back for the March 2014 air date. The evening of Martinâ€™s unique blend of comedy and bluegrass took place at the historic Fox Performing Arts Center in Riverside, California in the fall of 2013.
title: Steve Martin and the Steep Canyon Rangers featuring Edie Brickell Live
